author: egliwyona
msg: * New method getImagePath that constructs the image path. The default
implementation simply concatenates the sitemapPath and
uploadDirName. Subclasses can specify this further and add other
schemes as to where they think images should be stored.

author: egliwyona
msg: The filename is no longer simply takes from the identifier + the
extension of the uploaded file. If the identifier is non-empty this
method is still used. Otherwise the name of the uploaded file is taken.

author: egliwyona
msg: There is now a new variable insertImageBefore which specifies if the
media tag is inserted before or after the xpath. This variable can be
specified in the sitemap (as a parameter to the action).

author: egliwyona
msg: * Renamed the configuration parameters of the file-upload action from
"parameter" to a more sensible name, e.g. "images-dir"
